column4: Can someone tell me a good programming language to start with on linux? I'm mainly looking for shell programs, theres one I have in mind but I have no idea what its called.
if you want to write shell programs, learn shell scripting..

I have started but I want to know how to make the stuff look like the CentOS install (the blue background with the dialog in the middle), I don't know if its just stright shell or if its another language, I've used it before but I forgot about it.
